recently_narrative:
The most significant operational pattern observed across the article titles is the increasing reliance on AI and automation within the Zendesk ecosystem, coupled with a focus on streamlining customer support operations through integrations and workflow enhancements.

This suggests that Zendesk administrators need to prioritize understanding the capabilities and limitations of the AI-powered features, as well as ensuring seamless integration with other tools and platforms to optimize the overall customer experience, while also maintaining a close eye on system stability and performance as the platform evolves.

release_notes.summary:
1. Support added incremental export APIs for custom objects to enable customers to build reports on their custom object data in external reporting tools.

2. AI Agents Advanced released the unified request view and enabled agents to rate their own tickets where they are requestors, but fixed an issue where agents could no longer change a CSAT score for tickets they are not requestors of if they discover a link.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-09-19
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Support
AI Agents Advanced
Products with no updates this week
